animByList(callback, obj) {
    this.isAnimed = true;
    const animList = this.animList,
        self = this;

    let callAnim = (ind) => {
        const param = animList.get(ind);

        param && self.anim(param, () => {
            callAnim(ind + 1);
            const lastParam = animList.get(ind + 1);
            lastParam || callback && callback.call(obj || this);
        });

    };

    callAnim(0);
}

anim(animParam, callback) {
